revised_title: Burnside's Metabelian Groups and Engel Lengths
tldr: The authors study Burnside metabelian groups and their properties, specifically focusing on the Engel length and solubility class of these groups. They prove a theorem that provides an upper bound on the nilpotency class of metabelian groups with a given number of generators and exponent. This work contributes to the understanding of group theory and its applications in mathematics.
